title: Troubleshoot Custom Integration Error
description: A custom API integration built by the professional services team is failing with an authorization error.

tasks.description: Review the integration's execution logs to find the specific error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant finds a '403 Forbidden' error in the logs.

tasks.description: Check the permissions of the API key being used by the integration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant discovers the API key lacks the required 'write' permission for the endpoint it's trying to access.

tasks.description: Generate a new API key with the correct permissions and update the integration script.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant resolves the issue by correcting the permissions.
